ygData.subject: Tishan's Kilt
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone gotten the shadowed ball for the kilt yet?  I camped the other day with two of my level 40+ friends (warrior and a cleric) and we killed shadowed
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone gotten the shadowed ball for the kilt yet? I camped the other day with two of my level 40+ friends (warrior and a cleric) and we killed shadowed men nonstop (as fast as was possible. We were constantly waiting for them to respawn, and they respawn in about 5 min or so) for about 3 hours strait and I saw several shadowed patches, eye, fist, mask, book, shining stone, and numberless weapons, but no ball. Is it possible to get it or is it super rare??

-Shadowwalker
